Title: Black Run (1)
Plot: Under the impression that he may receive a confession, Boyd accepts the invite for a visit to the prison from former police officer Eddie Vine, who is serving a life sentence for murdering his friend and former fellow officer, Tom Pallisser.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Contains violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Julie Teal,  Francis Pope,  Pamela Hardman,  Ian  Groombridge,  Michael Gould,  Buffy Davis,  Terry Alderton,  James Bowers,  Diane Parish,  David Hayman,  Peter Polycarpou,  Robin Soans,  Michael Wildman,  Geff
